search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for UpViral (upviral.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for UpViral can be found at: [https://www.upviral.com/pricing](https://www.upviral.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
Try UpViral Risk-Free Today
---------------------------

Join 39,632\+ businesses generating leads & sales using UpViral. Start your 14-day trial today.

![Image 1: Star ratings image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ad86a99a624b6578bb14d4/6424321bc1a88be9bb5f1e97_star.png)

Rated 4.9/5 by 104+ marketers

![Image 2: Smart Marketers Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ad86a99a624b6578bb14d4/65098c33ef152df0449603c0_smart-marketers.png)

Monthly Yearly (save 20%)

[![Image 3: UpViral GetApp Category Leaders 2023](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655f1b7355449fa14c74445e/65b0d9b15eaca916786c6a1e_GA-Badge-CategoryLeaders-2023-FullColor-Positive%201%20(1).png)](https://www.getapp.com/marketing-software/a/upviral/)

[![Image 4: UpViral Capterra Shortlist 2023](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655f1b7355449fa14c74445e/65785ea7839dca5b9f6ce4bd_capterra-shortlist.png)](https://www.capterra.com/p/230137/UpViral/reviews/)

[![Image 5: UpViral Software Advice Front Runners 2023](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655f1b7355449fa14c74445e/65785ea7839dca5b9f6ce4bf_software-advice.png)](https://www.softwareadvice.com/referral-management/upviral-profile/)

[![Image 6: UpViral GetApp Category Leaders 2022](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655f1b7355449fa14c74445e/65785ea7839dca5b9f6ce4c1_get-app-category-leaders-2022.png)](https://www.getapp.com/marketing-software/a/upviral/)

![Image 7: Trophy Bubble Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655f1b7355449fa14c74445e/65785ea7839dca5b9f6ce4b5_icon-trophy-bubble%402x.webp)

**When you sign up today, you'll get an unconditional** **30-day money-back guarantee****. No questions asked.**

Why do we offer this? Simply put, UpViral just works.

Our existing clients already collected 82,800,394**\+ leads** using UpViral, and we'd ❤️ to be part of _your_ growth story as well.

It's simple. Sign up to UpViral, start your campaign, and if it doesn't grow your leads, subscribers or sales, we'll refund 100% of your purchase.

Sincerely,

![Image 8: Heart Bubble Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655f1b7355449fa14c74445e/65785ea7839dca5b9f6ce4af_icon-heart-bubble%402x.webp)![Image 9: Chat Bubble Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655f1b7355449fa14c74445e/65785ea7839dca5b9f6ce4b1_icon-chat-bubble%402x.webp)![Image 10: Like Bubble Icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655f1b7355449fa14c74445e/65785ea7839dca5b9f6ce4b3_icon-like-bubble1%402x.webp)

![Image 25: GABE SCHILLINGER Testimonial Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ad86a99a624b6578bb14d4/63c51594c092f8719bb38a0e_gabe.png)

### 42,000  
Leads!

"Because of UpViral, we were able to pull it off and did over $200,000 in sales! Which helped me realize that the ceiling on what I thought was possible in our industry is actually so much higher."

GABE SCHILLINGER

![Image 26: Abdel Mussa Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655f1b7355449fa14c74445e/6576f2191834dd7fa44e653f_abdel-mussa%402x.webp)

### "Upviral Has Easily Paid For Itself!"

"Before buying UpViral, I didn’t know what to expect, too many marketers promise big and under-deliver. I purchased UpViral and tried it out. UpViral has easily paid for itself. If I compare its results to what I would have had to pay on Facebook to get those same leads! Definitely a good investment."

ABDEL MUSSA

United Kingdom

![Image 27: Michael Cooch Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ad86a99a624b6578bb14d4/63c5126a9f1b457288d0dcac_michael-cooch-new.webp)

### 29,478  
Responsive Leads

"UpViral has proven to be the simple, effective and affordable viral contest app we were looking for. It helped us build a responsive 30,000+ list in a new market in less than six months."

MICHAEL COOCH

![Image 28: Judy Jong Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ad86a99a624b6578bb14d4/63cf97f8d193ab826b2d4c4e_judy-jong%402x.webp)

### "I'm A Newbie At This!"

"I had the privilege to be on of the beta testers of UpViral... So far I've already added 450 leads to my account... This may not seem like a lot, but I am a newbie with this by no means a Facebook guru... Getting 450 from my small niche websites is a LOT harder, so I will definitely continue building my list using UpViral!... You have a fan Wilco and I am sure other people will love UpViral too... Keep up the good work!"

JUDY JONG

The Netherlands

![Image 29: Steven VD Peijl Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655f1b7355449fa14c74445e/6576f2191834dd7fa44e6547_steven-vd-peijl%402x.webp)

### "740 Organic Leads in 2 Weeks!"

"UpViral has a huge impact on 2 of my projects! On the first project I used it to build up an early bird list which got us 740+ leads in just 2 weeks (all organic) with a 289.2% compound conversion rate!... When applying the same strategy to our second project it generated 1000+ leads!... I highly recommend using UpViral in your business. Wilco's products are always top-notch!"

STEVEN VD PEIJL

![Image 30: Arthur Jansen Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655f1b7355449fa14c74445e/6576f2191834dd7fa44e6549_arthur-jansen%402x.webp)

### "The Results Are Amazing!"

"UpViral is a wonderful tool that enables you to reach skies of online marketing. The results are amazing!"

ARTHUR JANSEN

The Netherlands

![Image 31: Paul Kutilin Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655f1b7355449fa14c74445e/6576f2191834dd7fa44e654b_paul-kutilin%402x.webp)

### "9000 Leads in 2 Weeks!"

"We used UpViral to promote our congress (local event) and the results were... shocking. We got more than 9000 leads through this tool in two weeks! We will definitely use UpViral for our other projects in the future. Thanks a lot for this tool!"

PAUL KUTILIN

Austria

![Image 32: Faruk Barber Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655f1b7355449fa14c74445e/6576f2191834dd7fa44e654d_faruk-barber%402x.webp)

### "Viral Referral Marketing At Its Best!"

Thanks yo Wilco, even guys like me can start building huge lists!

FARUK BARBER

The Netherlands

![Image 33: Nikolai Leuveld Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655f1b7355449fa14c74445e/6576f2191834dd7fa44e6552_nikolai-leuveld%402x.webp)

### "UpViral Rocks!"

"UpViral Rocks! We spent a little less than €200 on ad spend to promote our UpViral giveaway, resulting in 4,339 subscribers and €16.320 in revenue within 6 weeks (and from there it kept on going). Been using it ever since!"

NIKOLAI LEUVELD

![Image 34: Aldo Novak Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655f1b7355449fa14c74445e/6576f2191834dd7fa44e6563_aldo-novak%402x.webp)

### "I HAVE To Tell You How Impressed I Am!"

"After one of your videos I decided to give it a try. The results? Well, 10 minutes after publishing the link at Facebook, I received 20 new leads. Now, I have got 718 leads with ONE campaign! Wow!! THANK YOU!"

ALDO NOVAK

Brazil

![Image 35: Travis Luedke Image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63ad86a99a624b6578bb14d4/63cfa944d154ef168c8d8bdb_travis-luedke%402x.webp)

### "Well Over 15,000 Leads!"

"I have found UpViral is more effective than any other giveaway software/platform I've tried... It's my "go-to" lead collecting tool for all my giveaways. It's so versatile, with so many options, I'm still playing with it to learn new ways to use it. To date, I've collected well over 15,000 leads with UpViral."

TRAVIS LUEDKE

Brazil

Priority

![Image 271: Green check icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/655f1b7355449fa14c74445e/65785ea7839dca5b9f6ce4ae_icon-03-check-webtech-template.svg)

Once you choose the plan that best fits your needs, Starter, Business, or Premium, you’ll sign up with a full 14-day unlimited access to UpViral for only $1. After 14 days, if you decide to keep it, we’ll rebill the monthly or yearly subscription you selected.

Absolutely, our pricing model is fully flexible, which means you can upgrade or downgrade at any time.

Yes. There are no contracts or hidden fees so you can cancel your monthly or yearly service at any time.

Just click the “Get Started Now” button at the top of this page to sign up.

If you upgrade mid-month your new plan will begin immediately, if you downgrade then your current plan will continue until the next rebill.

The sky is the limit when it comes to creating your rewards. [We offer four different reward types](https://www.upviral.com/pricing#) (Double-sided, single-sided, milestone, and leaderboard) that are included in all plans.

Explore UpViral pricing details on this page. Discover monthly and yearly subscription costs, and compare features for informed decision-making.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Annual pricing offers a 20% discount compared to monthly pricing.
